com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport

Class TimeZoneInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.TimeZoneInfo

  • public final class TimeZoneInfo
extends Object
    Information about a time zone supported by the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimeZoneInfo(String timeZoneID, String displayName, String nonDstShortDisplayName, String dstShortDisplayName, boolean isDstObserved, String nonDstUtcOffset, String dstUtcOffset, int rawUtcOffset, String uniqueDisplayName)
      Constructs a new TimeZoneInfo by initializing all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDisplayName()
      Gets a String containing the display name for the time zone.
      String getDstShortDisplayName()
      Gets a String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is active.
      String getDstUtcOffset()
      Gets a String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is in effect.
      String getId()
      Gets a String containing the system identifier for the time zone.
      String getNonDstShortDisplayName()
      Gets a String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is not active.
      String getNonDstUtcOffset()
      Gets a String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is not in effect.
      int getRawUtcOffset()
      Gets the raw offset of the time zone from UTC, in seconds.
      String getUniqueDisplayName()
      Gets a String containing a unique display name for the time zone, in as localized a form as possible.
      boolean isDstObserved()
      Indicates whether the time zone described by this TimeZoneInfo observes daylight saving time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimeZoneInfo

        public TimeZoneInfo(String timeZoneID,
            String displayName,
            String nonDstShortDisplayName,
            String dstShortDisplayName,
            boolean isDstObserved,
            String nonDstUtcOffset,
            String dstUtcOffset,
            int rawUtcOffset,
            String uniqueDisplayName)
        Constructs a new TimeZoneInfo by initializing all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        timeZoneID - A String containing the identifier for the time zone.
        displayName - A String containing the display name for the time zone.
        nonDstShortDisplayName - A String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is not active.
        dstShortDisplayName - A String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is active.
        isDstObserved - true if the time zone described by this TimeZoneInfo observes daylight saving time; false otherwise.
        nonDstUtcOffset - A String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is not in effect. For example, "GMT-05:00". If isDstObserved is false, then this must be the same as dstUtcOffset.
        dstUtcOffset - A String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is in effect. For example, GMT-04:00". If isDstObserved is false, then this must be the same as nonDstUtcOffset.
        rawUtcOffset - The raw offset of the time zone from UTC, in seconds.
        uniqueDisplayName - A String containing a unique display name for the time zone, in as localized a form as possible.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Gets a String containing the system identifier for the time zone. This identifier is never localized.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Gets a String containing the display name for the time zone. This name is typically localized for location-specific time zones.

        Note: This name is not necessarily unique, and could therefore be ambiguous.

        Returns:
        See above.

      • getNonDstShortDisplayName

        public String getNonDstShortDisplayName()
        Gets a String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is not active. This name is typically localized for location-specific time zones.

        Note: This name is not necessarily unique, and could therefore be ambiguous. If isDstObserved() returns false, then this name matches the return value of getDstShortDisplayName().

        Returns:
        See above.

      • getDstShortDisplayName

        public String getDstShortDisplayName()
        Gets a String containing the short display name for the time zone when daylight saving time is active. This name is typically localized for location-specific time zones.

        Note: This name is not necessarily unique, and could therefore be ambiguous. If isDstObserved() returns false, then this name matches the return value of getNonDstShortDisplayName().

        Returns:
        See above.

      • isDstObserved

        public boolean isDstObserved()
        Indicates whether the time zone described by this TimeZoneInfo observes daylight saving time.
        Returns:
        true if the time zone described by this TimeZoneInfo observes daylight saving time; false otherwise.

      • getNonDstUtcOffset

        public String getNonDstUtcOffset()
        Gets a String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is not in effect. This description is never localized.

        Note: If isDstObserved() returns false, then this description matches the return value of getDstUtcOffset().

        Returns:
        See above.
        Since:
        4.0

      • getDstUtcOffset

        public String getDstUtcOffset()
        Gets a String that describes the offset of the time zone from UTC when daylight saving time is in effect. This description is never localized.

        Note: If isDstObserved() returns false, then this description matches the returns value of getNonDstUtcOffset().

        Returns:
        See above.
        Since:
        4.0

      • getRawUtcOffset

        public int getRawUtcOffset()
        Gets the raw offset of the time zone from UTC, in seconds.
        Returns:
        See above.
        Since:
        4.0

      • getUniqueDisplayName

        public String getUniqueDisplayName()
        Gets a String containing a unique display name for the time zone, in as localized a form as possible.

        Note: This name may be lengthy, and is not guaranteed to be fully localized. For example, the name might contain non-localized text for disambiguation purposes.

        Returns:
        See above.
        Since:
        4.0
